text: Digital Fashion is the visual representation of clothing built using computer technologies and 3D software. This way of making clothes is getting popular because it's good for the environment and uses advanced computer technology, like artificial intelligence. Digital fashion also means using computer tech in high-end fashion design. It's like mixing people and computers to create new designs. Technology helps people in the fashion world by giving them new ways to design and share their work. This mixing of technology and fashion happens in three main ways. Category:Fashion
title: Digital fashion
